mapper.select: SELECT d.drug_code, d.drug_name, d.unit_price, COALESCE(i.quantity, 0) AS quantity, COALESCE(i.location, '-') AS location, i.expiry_date AS expiration_date, i.supplier AS supplier, i.updated_at AS updated_at, COALESCE(ins.insurer_code, '-') AS insurer_code, COALESCE(ins.insurer_name, '-') AS insurer_name, d.created_at FROM drug d LEFT JOIN inventory_item i ON TRIM(d.drug_name) = TRIM(i.item_name) LEFT JOIN insurer ins ON d.insurance_code = ins.insurer_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug (drug_code, drug_name, unit, unit_price, quantity, expiration_date, insurance_code, supplier, inventory_id, created_at) VALUES (#{drugCode}, #{drugName}, #{unit}, #{unitPrice}, #{quantity}, #{expirationDate}, #{insuranceCode}, #{supplier}, #{inventoryId}, now())

INSERT INTO inventory_item ( item_name, unit, quantity, price, supplier, expiry_date, location, drug_code, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{drugName}, #{unit}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{supplier}, #{expirationDate}, '약품창고-1', #{drugCode}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE drug SET drug_name = #{drugName}, unit=#{unit}, unit_price=#{unitPrice}, quantity=#{quantity}, expiration_date=#{expirationDate}, insurance_code=#{insuranceCode}, supplier=#{supplier} WHERE drug_code=#{drugCode}
UPDATE inventory_item SET item_name = #{drugName}, unit = #{unit}, quantity = #{quantity}, price = #{unitPrice}, supplier = #{supplier}, expiry_date = #{expirationDate} WHERE drug_code = #{drugCode}
mapper.select: SELECT drug_code AS drugCode, drug_name AS drugName, unit, unit_price AS unitPrice FROM drug WHERE (drug_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR drug_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND unit != '주사' ORDER BY drug_name LIMIT 20
